channel.title: Help.... i need
channel.description:
umm i was wondering when i copy the code do i fill out the stuff they ask? like sn and password.. than when i copy it only copies one line keeps going on... do i copy parts sepretly or all at once...
i start copying from beggining hoold the click to highlight all than copy and paste in scar.
... other post ppl call me lech i dunno what that is so...
and i cant figure scar out after reading all the help stuff and everything...
i dunno what to do with color droper also
help me with some of these things... or if u have teaching vid id really wanna see it other 1 i dl didnt play on my windows media player...

item.title: Help.... i need
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

to stop it from copying into one like first ‘Quote’ the scipt and then from there, copy it.
When you paste it into SCAR it should be just like a normal script, not all in one line.
~jr

Read full topic

item.title: Help.... i need
item.dc:creator: @Rahmafett Rahmafett
item.description:
@Rahmafett wrote:

When you copy from a SCAR tag, you should move the mouse to the first letter in the first line. Your mouse pointer must turn into the ‘I’ for it to copy correctly. Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Help.... i need
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

When you’re copying the code from say, a SCAR tag, like this…

[scar]
program New;

begin
DoStuff;
end.
[/scar]

Try copying from the very first line of code, which here is ‘program New;’ and stop copying at the very last line of code, which is ‘end.’ Do not copy the blank lines before the first or after the last line of code.

As for the color dropper, go here for some instructions…

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

-Weibs

Read full topic
